explore.name: Robowars
explore.about: Techkriti’s flagship event Robowars being the ultimate test of engineering excellence, teamwork, strategy, and gaming. Techkriti provides you with a wonderful opportunity to witness robots ripping apart from each other. Each team is expected to come up with a wired/wirelessly controlled robot capable of one on one combat. With pneumatic pincers, mighty armors, nifty axes and more innovative weapons, these merciless mercenaries shall fight for the glory of their makers, upholders of the dignity of their institutions. The law of the jungle, of 'might is right', shall prevail.

explore.name: Manoeuvre
explore.about: The event requires that the participants construct a 4 wheeled gripper robot with constrained dimensions that could move over various terrains and perform simple tasks such as grabbing and shifting. Gameplay consists of two bots coordinating with each other and transporting and moving the blocks and special objects around and then stacking or arranging them in patterns thus fetching points.

explore.name: IARC
explore.about: International Autonomous Robotics Challenge (IARC),one of the major events of Techkriti has attracted maximum international participation in Techkriti throughout the years. It also witnessed participation from different countries like Bangladesh, Sri-Lanka, etc in the previous edition of Techkriti,. The problem statement will be based on the concept of the autonomous line-following maze, wall following, wall maze, color detection, and object counting.

explore.name: Embeddded
explore.about: Embedded systems design is a productive synergy between hardware and software design. This is the advanced level competition for all the hardcore electronics geeks. As technology advances, it reverses the characteristics of every situation repeatedly. The age of automation is going to be the age of 'Do it Yourself (DIY).' So why not drive the bandwagon rather than jumping on it. For this event, you would be automating some real home appliances such as AC LEDs, etc., making things appropriate for the user.

explore.name: Skysparks
explore.about: Sky Sparks provides a platform to compete with different flyers through a series of different rounds doing different maneuvers and presenting their talent in flying like payload dropping, limbo flying and on spot landing. The competition involves RC aircraft with electric motors with more than 300  participants in Sky Sparks in the past, which was sponsored by Boeing and also served as a prelim to the Boeing National Aeromodelling Competition.

explore.name: Multirotor
explore.about: Participants are required to model a multirotor and will be judged on various aspects of a multirotor that is on the expertise of your flying skill, the stability of your bot and the ability to pick and drop payloads. The multirotor should be well fabricated and controls should be highly sophisticated in order to advance further in this competition. A wonderful opportunity to meet some of the top Multi rotor pilots, technicians, inventors and enthusiasts of the country at Take-off, Techkriti. Amaze the audience with your models and make this competition a great success with your performances.

explore.name: Hovermania
explore.about: One of the most interesting competitions is the Hovermania which is a rugby match among hovercrafts. Each team is required to design and fabricate a hovercraft that is lightweight, easily maneuverable, quick and strong. They must throw their opponent off the arena in a match of hovermania. Here is a best chance to put forward your talent in designing the most efficient quick wrestling hovercraft

explore.name: IOPC
explore.about: A programming contest where each coder whacks his brain to code solutions to the given problems. The contest tests optimization, proficiency, skills & hard work of the teams. It is a 3-hr online coding competition that gathers high international participation. The difficulty level of the problems varies from medium to difficult and the codes can be of C, C++, Pascal, Python, Java, etc.

explore.name: CTF
explore.about: Code golf and golf are on the same line. Code golf is a programming competition based upon the  idea of the golf where the player who completes the course in the fewest strokes wins.. The goal of this competition is to implement a given algorithm correctly with the shortest source code. The creativity and the skills are tested to an extreme level as the only way to win is by having an excellent out of the box idea

explore.name: Pitch premier
explore.about: Pitch Premier is organized with an  aim to provide participants (essentially students currently pursuing their UG/PG  programs) with an opportunity that can transform their innovation - something  as simple and small scale initiative as their summer project or a research endeavor - into real world entrepreneurial ideas. Through this event, we examine one's ability to evaluate the market, customer needs, and product usability which is important in the entrepreneurial journey. The event also helps evaluate one's plan of action to safeguard the intellectual rights of their product (majorly  by creating entry barrier) and the future research goals associated with the same product or plans to launch parallel products.

explore.name: Stockism
explore.about: Stocksim is the real-time simulation of the stock market where you get the chance to experience thrills and frills of the Dalal street. The virtual market price of shares is kept updated in real-time with BSE and NSE along with relevant news updates tipping the scales.

explore.name: BDC
explore.about: A great opportunity to prove your mettle as an innovative engineer and mark your talent nationwide by building your own model of the bridge. Now it’s time to build a bridge model with Creativity, Design & Technique. The model built by each team will be tested until failure by applying an incremental static load. So, do come and be a part of this extraordinary event which will surely leave you with a marvelous experience.

explore.name: EDC
explore.about: Egg drop challenge is an on the spot event in which teams have to design a compact structure using different types of materials acquired under budget constraints. Teams are required to design a structure that can prevent the egg from cracking when dropped from a certain height. The egg is an analogical representation of some precious cargo, such as a human being, that ideally should not be harmed upon re-entry into the atmosphere from space.

explore.name: ADC
explore.about: Autocad Design challenge gives you an opportunity to create out-of-the box design ideas which will be judged by a panel of industry experts.

explore.name: IORC
explore.about: Indian Open Speedcubing competition is conducted in association with The World Cube Association (WCA) which governs competitions for all such puzzles. The legacy of the Indian Open continues and we present the 12th edition of the competition. It has witnessed many national records being broken since 2008. All results secured in the competition will be uploaded in the WCA Database and each participant will receive their national, continental and global rankings in all the events he/she participates in.
